website_summaries.verdict: Light enough to float, this sports wallet is the perfect thing to hold your keys, ID, cards and other small essentials while you're out on the water.
pros: This crush-proof, water-resistant sports wallet holds your keys, ID, cards and money
Includes dual mesh pocket organization and nylon lanyard
Exterior dimensions measure 5.75 inches by 3.5 inches by 0.5 inch
cons: Not good for use as an all-purpose wallet

customer_reviews.title: Slim, effective minimalist wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as a minimalist wallet while road cycling on the weekends. It's slim & fits perfectly in my jersey pockey, allowing me to carry ID/ATM/Health insurance cards & some paper bills. Works perfectly, keeps bills dry in VERY sweaty/rainy conditions, would recommend. Also, in some reviews I saw at least one review mentioning swimming or diving with one of these, and being disappointed when the contents got wet. I, for one, received the item inside packaging specifically advising in print against swimming/diving use. Just sayin'.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item in the mail. All the pelican products I have purchased in the past have been great quality so I assumed this would be the case with the wallet. I was wrong. I just opened the packaging, opened up the wallet, and found that the plastic inside attached to the mesh is warped and coming unglued from the inside of the wallet. Since the country of origin is not on the description, for those of you who are used to quality Pelican products made in the USA, be warned that this item was made in China. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Great product all around and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is great for credit cards expecially if you need to keep them waterproof or anything like that this case is amazing for keeping credit cards or anything like that so it waterproof and safe of crushing Pelican is the best product for holding things like that or anything for that matter and protecting it anything you want to protect order a pelican they have bigger cases than this believe me I have a whole bunch of them that I protect my glass art with thank you Pelican for making such a great product and thank you Amazon for allowing me to be able to purchase this product
customer_reviews.author: Steven M jr

customer_reviews.title: Could almost hold a phone
customer_reviews.text: It's good as a waterproof case, but I would not call it "micro" anything. This is not a small wallet. In fact I don't use it as a wallet in all honesty, my phone's got enough bulk to carry around. In fact I was looking for a good phone case with a lid and wallet combo all in one. Something like Armor King mixed with Vault Slim wallet. I like pretty much all of Pelican's stuff but if they're looking to expand their inventory into wallet sized cases, I think the phone/wallet combo is the way to go with their style of products.
customer_reviews.author: Down with the Crown

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for boating, some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say this thing is awesome! However, I got it to use as a general wallet... not suited for that unless you have large pockets. It is all the things that pelican stands for: waterproof, crush-proof, dust-proof, etc. Great for on the water protection of cards, cash, ID... It's thin, but quite long. The handy strap that's included will be great for boat, but the tab it connects to makes the wallet very long. I only wish it was built into a corner, rather than added onto the end.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ross

customer_reviews.title: Carries more than I thought it would, good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, It's not going to carry a lot but I have gotten more than just a cpl cards and a few bills in it. I wanted something I could carry credit/debit cards, drivers license, some cash and also some business cards but I wanted the business cards to stay crisp and clean. Without forcing, I have 2 debit cards, my DL and 4 bills on the one side. The other side carries 6 or 7 heavy stock business cards and a few more bills. I'm happy I took a chance on this, totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanzbenz

customer_reviews.title: Who would think you would need this
customer_reviews.text: It keeps your money dry and your cards handy! floats! secure and fits in the side pockets of most swimwear. I purchased this item almost a year ago and have been abroad a few times since then. I did not use it on those journeys because I thought it was too bulky. However, I recently went to the Bahamas and although I packed it, I truly did not think I would use it. But Throughout the whole trip, it was the only wallet I used. Although a little bulky, I liked it, feeling the bulk let me know that it was securely in my pocket, using it at restaurants and in the hotel was no issue either..
customer_reviews.author: Ron G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: This is a sport wallet to keep your stuff dry. I fit 15 cards in mine. If you wanna carry family pics cards etc....get yourself a nice wallet and call it done, if you don't get up off the couch except to run to the fridge, again get a wallet. This is rugged, water tight, just right for the active man.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect concept but not necessarily a perfect implementation since they ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect concept but not necessarily a perfect implementation since they just reused an existing case. You still have to fold US bills in thirds so they can fit. They need to come up with a case made just for this purpose otherwise this one will just sit on a desk forever and never get used.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality little case, but I've found it too small to be useful for anything -- the pockets on the side of the case are surprisingly thick and take up far more room in the case than they should. I did discover that the pockets and their backers can pretty easily be pulled out of the case. While that isn't what is intended it did make the case slightly more useful. If you need a case of this size I'm sure it would be great. . . If the pockets/backers were engineered to be much thinner I'd give this a better ranking.
customer_reviews.author: webjon

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Decent little case. Works good for credit cards or business cards. I work outside so I decided to use it for my business cards. Will hold 18-20 and still close water tight. Worthless as a wallet if you carry cash. As other reviews state you have to fold up the money which makes it very bulky
customer_reviews.author: Matthew david bardin

customer_reviews.title: Holds about 10-12 cards without bulging after modding
customer_reviews.text: To fit a few more cards without it bulging, I took out the foam backing on both sides and left the mesh attached to the plastic. Used some super glue to adhere them back into place. I don’t carry cash on me. Make sure you don’t overload it to where it’s bulging. It won’t form an air tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Stygian Crow

customer_reviews.title: Good construction wallet
customer_reviews.text: Need a wallet for construction? Buy this. Cut off the lanyard molded plastic loop and it fits in your pocket nicely. My cards look like the day I got them. I grind concrete and stone a lot. This thing is a bit larger than your normal wallet and you have to fold your bills to fit but it fits a lot and is about as thick and long as an iPhone 6, easy for the front pocket to carry.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the storage barely held 5 cards and cash. The mesh after 1 week of use tore.
customer_reviews.author: Nick g

customer_reviews.title: I've used my case for a week now, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used my case for a week now, and I am very impressed how it hold's all my credentials for work, and out the elements being that my occupation to work in all element no matter the conditions "aviation". I am very familiar with the Pelican brand from my military career and the expectation to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quality Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. I'm an electrician and I work in some pretty hot environments and am subject to getting wet. I can safely store five cards on each side and carry this with me all day long. I haven't had any issues with banging it around or sitting on it, other than its obviously harder than a normal wallet. I've even sprayed it with the hose to test it and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Durable & dry
customer_reviews.text: This case has a gasket that keeps the inside dry . It’s bulky but not so bad that you can’t get used to it. If you carry a backpack or some kind of “tactical man purse” it would work out easily lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: The thing you didn't think you needed; that's what this is. Going out to lunch, etc, I'll carry this with my license, a card or two, and a bit of cash rather than carrying my purse. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hiltabidle

customer_reviews.title: It wont leak if you water test it in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It wont leak if you water test it in the sink, but I went snorkeling with this in my pocket and even at a few feet deep it took in water. after about 30 minutes floating on the surface I opened it up and all the money was soaking wet. Its more for if you accidently drop your wallet in a mud puddle...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicate, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Have had for ~1 week with no excessive force used on it, but the latch is broken near the pin (cracked) and will likely not operate much longer.
customer_reviews.author: IT guy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described
customer_reviews.text: I Love This, As I Do All Pelican Cases. However, If They Re-Did It More In Line With A Credit Card Size / Format, I'd Buy It All Over Again & Never Look Back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Big wallet
customer_reviews.text: Lanyard was wack. Broke on second day. Other then that great wallet. Much bigger then you imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: The case is awesome, strong and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The case is awesome, strong and waterproof, but the mesh pockets and liners aren't very good. the liners are thick, and the mesh is attached in a weird way so it doesn't go all they way from end to end. -not big enough to hold a dollar (unless its folded in 1/3) -not big enough to hold much else -super thick for how little it holds. I still use it every day, but it could be so much better.
customer_reviews.author: A Concerned Citizen.

customer_reviews.title: It is nice but very little room for storage including little to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this wallet once to go to New York with. The rubber gasket likes to pop out from time to time and it is very tight on the inside. I am going to use this for hunting season I think unless I get the Attacoa wallet. It is nice but very little room for storage including little to no room for cash. the hard case structure is great but was not what I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rick

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid, good capacity
customer_reviews.text: Product will hold a 3 credit cards/drivers license and a few (3-5) bills if arranged properly without stressing the seal. Adequate capacity and seems well built. Have not yet field tested to see how weather/water resistant it is but initial impressions do not give me cause for concern. Will update if that turns out to be incorrect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Small and he doesn't have much money to stuff it with
customer_reviews.author: lynda heatherington

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Well that didn't work out because of the inability to put money in there,yep it doesn't hold much not really very useful .Easy fix just to have a 1/2 more on all sides why they made something that will not hold a dollar bill it beyond me .
customer_reviews.author: TD325

customer_reviews.title: It is not waterproof my Drivers license got wet, ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not waterproof my Drivers license got wet, and there was nothing breaking the seal. It simply didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, but poor design
customer_reviews.text: It's a Pelican case, so I knew it would be well made, and it is. My issues are with the design and functionality. If you want to use it for anything other that 3-4 cards and a little cash, you'll be disappointed. I had planned on putting 5-10 cards and cash in it and it won't even close. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Master Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. As a fire fighter I have stuff I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. As a fire fighter I have stuff I don't want getting sweaty or wet. Fits my license and other cards that I need to carry on the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Smaller than I imagined however, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well ! Smaller than I imagined however, it does the job of keeping my DL and CC dry as well as a few US bills. Please note that money has to be folded twice to fit on one side or the other to fit in the case. Also if you add too much money or a bulky car key it will affect the integrity of the waterproofing seal.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wyche

customer_reviews.title: Worried about the large size wallet fitting in my swim trunk pocket since it is about the size of my Galaxy 4 smart phone. But i
customer_reviews.text: Lost the wallet in the lazy river and later found by life guard at resort since it floats. When I opened the wallet, everything was still dry and secure. Worried about the large size wallet fitting in my swim trunk pocket since it is about the size of my Galaxy 4 smart phone. But it did fine. Just make sure your swim trunk pocket has velcro.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Seems waterproof but clumsy accessing items
customer_reviews.text: The case is definitely airtight, but the internal mesh sleeves are clumsy to try and access cards from. Not much of a 'wallet' as it is a 'case' that you just throw your stuff into. It does seem durable though.
customer_reviews.author: Bahamut Zero

customer_reviews.title: I definitely like the wallet
customer_reviews.text: Though it is a bit larger than I thought it would be, I definitely like the wallet. The amount of space in the wallet is the one thing that prevents me from using it as a daily driver. I think it is good for a trip to the beach or white water rafting. Still like it, still going to use it, just wish there was more a space inside
customer_reviews.author: Jason stearns

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little wallet. Just what I was looking for on diving trips. Not a huge wallet but just enough for some money and other small items. I like that this is waterproof and crush proof. If you are looking for a huge wallet then do not buy this as you will be disappointed. It will hold some money and credit cards, drivers license, etc. Great wallet for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to a son in law who likes durability and security he really loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Tough wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet.. although the gasket seems like it is stretching with use..
customer_reviews.author: james simons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used for study storage of little keepsakes and occasionally as a wallet. Very waterproof and airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a minimal wallet for visiting Smithsonian museums to avoid issues with metal detectors. This worked well. The liner does have a tendency to pull up and coins don't always stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: it worked great while it lasted though
customer_reviews.text: after about 6 months of use the plastic on the hinge failed. it worked great while it lasted though. kept everything dry and safe. fold bills into 3rds or 4ths to fit.
customer_reviews.author: jake arias

customer_reviews.title: Good for Outdoor Activities
customer_reviews.text: Had this wallet about a week now. About the size of an Iphone 6plus in a case, so it is not too large. I store about 6-8 cards (debit, library, fishing, etc..) and a few bucks. For the money you will need to fold it in order to place it into the wallet, and this can limit how much money you can carry since the folding makes the money thicker to place in the wallet. So the higher the bills the more money you can carry. Overall I am pleased with the wallet. I normally carry the wallet in my front pocket, or in a side cargo pocket. Hope this review helps. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT. ALL CARD SIZES FIT NICELY AND SEEMS INDESTRUCTIBLE AND WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.author: DDLC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and will be used on my boat to hold my house keys, cash, and gas card.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO DE LA RAMA

customer_reviews.title: Booze or Cruise You Can't Loose!
customer_reviews.text: I like to save water and drink booze while vacationing at the beach, or while on a cruise.. Which eventually leads to wet money and lost cards. Not any more!!! Just went to the Cayman Islands last week and the pelican case kept all my tip money and credit cards dry and secure. New favorite travel wallet!
customer_reviews.author: jayson sumpter

customer_reviews.title: but it does a good job of keeping everything safe
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny, but it does a good job of keeping everything safe. Haven't tested it too much in water yet, but I've dropped it a bunch and it's survived.
customer_reviews.author: bosco

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Can put in bathing trunks at beach with keys, money and credit cards...
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not very thin. Looks and feel like a cheap plastic soap box in your pocket
customer_reviews.author: Wupac 808

customer_reviews.title: Too small for holding IPhone 6 and other smartphones with same size or bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I believed the product could hold an IPhone 6 - that was a mistake. It is to small to hold any normal sized smartphone. The construction is very good and solid, like any other Pelican product. It can hold creditcards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wallet is great but the O ring loves to pop off and ...
customer_reviews.text: wallet is great but the O ring loves to pop off and the mesh pockets inside ripped in the first week of using this product. quality is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Kos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits in my cycling jersey and enables me to carry DL,credit card and a little cash
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Mask

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the interior has come apart from the plastic
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Waterproof Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I plan to use this as a wallet when I'm on my Bike this Summer. I don't carry a lot of things in my wallet so this is the right size. I also like the hard casing. This is a good value
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: holds all my credit and debit cards and slips neatly ...
customer_reviews.text: holds all my credit and debit cards and slips neatly in my pocket. Crush proof, air tight and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: GARY B.

customer_reviews.title: Very tough wallet. Not much room compared to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tough wallet. Not much room compared to a regular trifold, but I took out one side of the interior mesh and now it holds a lot more cards. I would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was everything and more that I was looking for. A little more accessible for more day to day use would be helpful. Still a top notch product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Buchmiller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Third or forth I've purchased for a gift to be used as a wallet .
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: It seals tight and is of good quality. I'm liking the "test drive" so far
customer_reviews.text: This item is about 1.5" longer than the standard wallet and the extra space doesn't necessarily lets you fit more. It takes some getting used to. It seals tight and is of good quality. I'm liking the "test drive" so far.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Balasquide

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in the under seat cut out for BWM F800GS
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: Nice tough case, putting credit cards in is easy but taking them out is a little difficult, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Klopp

customer_reviews.title: If you are needing a case to keep your credit ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are needing a case to keep your credit cards and money dry around water this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the outdoorsman
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hold plenty of stuff. Made me feel much better while being in a boat in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wallet/MicroCase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for money, cards & ID as well as a short pen or a couple of cigarettes. Extremely well made. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: PhiLo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend  buying this,  you will love it! ( Also makes a great gift for a friend, or  your  kids...)
customer_reviews.text: Another very cool, reliable and great Value from Pelican... I will be using when outdoors, at the beach, Skiing or on the Boat... Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Schwartz / UPSIDE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality but dont expect to get much in here
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Not a big deal but would have been nice to get a solid case
customer_reviews.text: Inside the case there is a mesh that holds money or coins. The glue in mine was coming apart. Not a big deal but would have been nice to get a solid case.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Not so spacious but enough for what you need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: easily removed. Not sure exactly how waterproof it really ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid Product. Didn't care for the strap, easily removed. Not sure exactly how waterproof it really is but it does have rubber seals around the edges. The overall design is very durable and it met my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr+Mrs Young

customer_reviews.title: Pelican does it again.
customer_reviews.text: very nice protector for the price. It lives up to the pelican name brand. I use it for all kinds of things when I go hiking or even just for storing small things around the house. I think its at a good price point and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Yeti

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting this to be too thick to be comfortable in a back pocket but I barely notice it
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting this to be too thick to be comfortable in a back pocket but I barely notice it. It's the perfect wallet for me. Would recommend for the active outdoors man or woman that wants to keep their stuff dry and does not carry a lot of cards.
customer_reviews.author: dlginsburg515

customer_reviews.title: Field tested
customer_reviews.text: Works like it says. I was in the field for 3 weeks and in the rain for several hours. Everything was dry inside. Really took alot abuse and held up to my tactical standard. Will never go back to a regular wallet again.
customer_reviews.author: ken shafer

customer_reviews.title: Pelican is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Been using Pelican products for many years, I absolutely love this company. As far as I'm concerned there are ZERO competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Some lady in Florida

customer_reviews.title: good for a trip or two
customer_reviews.text: works as described. The ring will fail after a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: JDUB74

customer_reviews.title: Pelican
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, what else needs to be said. It is a Pelican and it hold my credit cards. I use it as a wallet and it keeps everthing dry.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Water proof...eeh
customer_reviews.text: First time tested ,at a water park . After the day ,opened it up all my cards and cash were soaked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for pool or beach
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's completely waterproof! I use this at the beach and the pool to carry cash, IDs, and credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have room to hold much cash but otherwise is functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Will serve its purpose. Not certain it ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid.Will serve its purpose. Not certain it will fit a phone, Galaxy S3 won't fit. Only two mesh pockets on inside, not card slots.
customer_reviews.author: BiCoastal

customer_reviews.title: great for military. too tall for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel or military. Fits nicely in my ankle pocket and absolutely crush proof. Holds all 9 of my cards plus 10-12 bills. A little too tall for back pocket carry. Rips the pocket when you sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised. It only holds a few cards and a little cash. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: bardley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Holds 6 or 8 cards + a receipt or 2. Prevents damage to cards. Not pleasant to sit on for several hours but neither is a traditional leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: KDiddy707

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.....
customer_reviews.text: The Pelican 0955-010-110 Micro Sport Wallet by Pelican Products is fantastic, it locks very securely and I feel confident that my cards are safe and secure as well as a small amount of cash fits well within its storage area. The wrist loop is sturdy and fits throug
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: A little big for my taste but awesome anyways.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a near indestructible wallet this is it. A little big for my taste but awesome anyways.
customer_reviews.author: MetalMan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This item was not quite what I had wanted I was looking for something that I could put my flash drives in and still be small and portable, but I can use it for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Shinee

customer_reviews.title: It's waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I used it for swimming at Clearwater beach Fl. It kept what has in it dry. Had to secure it to my suit good, it floats good. Wish it we're big enough for a modern car key though
customer_reviews.author: rdhowdy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Protects in general but not really waterproof but defiantly moisture resistant. Money gets moist but not soaked
customer_reviews.author: Evan & Trena Linden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong after 6 months. Doesn't let water in
customer_reviews.author: Omar Alba

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I tested it and immersed it in water. I even stepped on it. Nothing happened. How wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it because its secure. Only downfall is the space inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: great because of the mesh pockets
customer_reviews.text: BUY! great because of the mesh pockets. other durable wallets don't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Ownh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too wide, but too smal inside, is not for a wallet...
customer_reviews.author: Carolmcam

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for use at beaches and pools.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy durable and floats keeps your items dry. It is great for pool, beach, and gym uses if you want to have something small and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mele

customer_reviews.title: awesome wallet
customer_reviews.text: Little bulky in your back pocket but other then that.... it's AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawn

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the little guys out.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work for keeping the toddlers out of my significant others wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Quendan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not fully waterproof, it has leaked on me a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: Kheang Lim

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: Good product ! Found it a little tough to fold and keep bills without deteriorating them
customer_reviews.author: Saptadeep

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's cool, I wish it had a little more room, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Conn

customer_reviews.title: Great water proof wallet
customer_reviews.text: This pelican wallet provides excellent protection however I wish it was a bit thicker (more capacity for cards,ID, etc.). Overall great for a day out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: ED F

customer_reviews.title: but durable and good quality for small items
customer_reviews.text: A little small for what I needed it for, but durable and good quality for small items.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: my biggest disappointment is that Pelican products are now made in China
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my biggest disappointment is that Pelican products are now made in China. Now the case is tough and durable.....BUT with the webbing inside sewn into a piece of kydex really limits what it will hold. I was VERY bummed that all I could get to fit in it were six cards, some cash and one key, anymore and you couldn't close it. I carried it two days and decided the hard shape and low storage capacity weren't worth it. Ill use it when I'm in a rough and tumble environment. Save your money and just get a zip lock bag.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.F.F.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Enough capacity for 2 id's,a couple of credit cards and some cash. I wore it on water rides, got completely drenched and everything was dry and intact afterward. Size fits in a front or back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blum

product_meta.title: Pelican 0955-010-110 Micro Sport Wallet ProGear Liner
product_meta.description: Protect your belongings with the Crush Proof and Water-Resistant Rigid Sports Wallet. With a water-resistant 360° seal, the crush proof and waterproof wallet floats and holds keys, cell phones, IDs, credit cards and cash. With a lifetime guarantee, the wallet includes an easy-open latch, dual mesh pocket organization and a nylon lanyard. Exterior Dimensions is 5.75 x 3.5 x 0.5 inches.
